content.webTitle: Watford v Crystal Palace: match preview

fields.headline: Watford v Crystal Palace: match preview
fields.bodyText: Crystal Palace have banked six points without conceding after a brutal run of defeats against Liverpool, Chelsea and Manchester City. Roy Hodgson will be confident his side can maintain their run against managerless Watford who are back in a rut. Seven points from safety could quickly snowball into being completely cut adrift if they do not hire the right man soon. Wilfried Zaha finding form escalates the danger of a fourth consecutive defeat. Graham Searles Saturday 3pm Venue Vicarage Road Last season Watford 2 Crystal Palace 1 Referee Martin Atkinson This season G13 Y35 R2 2.85 cards/game Odds H 7-5 A 21-10 D 11-5 WATFORD Subs from Gomes, Bachmann, Quina, Chalobah, Zeegelaar, Foulquier, Dahlberg, Kabasele, Success, Hughes, Janmaat Doubtful Janmaat (knee), Kabasele (hamstring) Injured Dawson (head, 14 Dec), Cleverley (heel), Holebas (ankle), Janmaat (knee), Welbeck (hamstring), Prödl (knee, all unknown) Suspended None Discipline Y30 R1 Form DLWLLL Leading scorers Deulofeu, Gray 2 CRYSTAL PALACE Subs from Henderson, Hennessey, Dann, Camarasa, Riedewald, McCarthy, Benteke, Dreher, Tavares, Lokilo, Wickham Doubtful Cahill (knee), Dann (ankle) Injured Van Aanholt (hamstring), Ward (knee, both unknown) Suspended Sakho (first of three) Discipline Y27 R1 Form DLLLWW Leading scorer Ayew 4
